Ttcs.Description: Mapping of connected PST3S(s) from port to STRx (there should not be duplicates, the unused port(s) should be INVALID)

Item.Description: Assigns an STR handle to the PST3S connected to port 1
Assigns an STR handle to the PST3S connected to port 2
Assigns an STR handle to the PST3S connected to port 3
Assigns an STR handle to the PST3S connected to port 4

Ttcs.Description: Get PST3S TLM Packet from STR1. Triggers TLM Request

Item.Description: PST3S CMOS Chip ID Self-test Result
PST3S Minimum Navigation Stars When Quaternion is Valid

PST3S Minimum Navigation Stars When Quaternion is Valid

Ttcs.Description: Get PST3S TLM Packet from STR3. Triggers TLM Request

Item.Description: PST3S CMOS Chip ID Self-test Result
PST3S Minimum Navigation Stars When Quaternion is Valid
